mapper.select:
SELECT l.post_id AS post_id, p.contents, p.likes, i.img_path, i.saved_img_name FROM `like` AS l
JOIN ( SELECT post_id, MIN(id) AS min_image_id FROM image WHERE is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY post_id ) AS min_img ON l.post_id = min_img.post_id JOIN image AS i ON min_img.post_id = i.post_id AND min_img.min_image_id = i.id JOIN post AS p ON l.post_id = p.id
WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_deleted = 0
AND l.create_date < ( SELECT create_date FROM `like` WHERE post_id = #{lastId} LIMIT 1 )
ORDER BY l.create_date DESC LIMIT #{size}
